page.title: 03Crowthorne Transport Options
page.content:
Berkshire County Council has unveiled plans for a long awaited{Sandhurst _ {Crowthorne bypass.}Four possible routes costing between Â£2.75m and Â£3.26m are being considered.
All routes use the existing Owlsmoor spine road and will pass to the east of Broadmoor Hospital. The options differ as to where the bypass will link with the A3095 north of the village.Three of the options favour a junction at Nine Mile Ride.
A County Council proposal that the High St.in Crowthorne be closed to traffic has been opposed by the Parish Council.The County Surveyor is to be consulted about traffic control and management both in the High Street and at either end of the bypass.
